00030 template <typename T, int M, int N>
00031 struct CoreTransformer {
00032     T * _data;
00033     typename Core<M>::ConstPtr _input;
00034     typename Core<N>::Ptr _output;
00035     
00036     CoreTransformer(
00037         T * data,
00038         typename Core<M>::ConstPtr const & input,
00039         typename Core<N>::Ptr const & output
00040     ) : _data(data), _input(input), _output(output) {}
00041     
00042     template <int M1, int N1>
00043     CoreTransformer(CoreTransformer<T,M1,N1> const & other) : 
00044         _data(other._data), _input(other._input), _output(other._output) {}
00045 };
00046 
00047 template <int N, int C, int I>
00048 struct Dimensions {
00049     typedef boost::mpl::int_<N> ND;  // Number of dimensions in output array
00050     typedef boost::mpl::int_<C> RMC; // Number of contiguous dimensions in output array, from end.
00051     typedef boost::mpl::int_<I> IDX; // Current dimension of input array being processed.
00052     typedef boost::mpl::int_<N-I> N_I; 
00053 };

00055 template <typename Index> struct IndexTraits;
00056 
00057 template <>
00058 struct IndexTraits<ndarray::index::Slice> {
00059 
00060     template <typename D> 
00061     struct Append {
00062         typedef Dimensions< 
00063             D::ND::value, 
00064             ((D::RMC::value < D::N_I::value) ? D::RMC::value : (D::N_I::value - 1)),
00065             (D::IDX::value + 1)
00066         > Type;
00067     };
00068 
00070     template <typename T, int M, int N> struct TransformCoreResult {
00071         typedef CoreTransformer<T,M-1,N-1> Type;
00072     };
00073 
00075     template <typename T, int M, int N>
00076     static CoreTransformer<T,M-1,N-1> transformCore(
00077         ndarray::index::Slice const & index, CoreTransformer<T,M,N> & t
00078     ) {
00079         NDARRAY_ASSERT(index.step > 0);
00080         NDARRAY_ASSERT(index.start <= index.stop);
00081         NDARRAY_ASSERT(index.start >= 0);
00082         NDARRAY_ASSERT(index.stop <= t._input->getSize());
00083         t._data += index.start * t._input->getStride();
00084         t._output->setSize(index.computeSize());
00085         t._output->setStride(t._input->getStride() * index.step);
00086         return t;
00087     }
00088 
00089 };
00090 
00091 template <>
00092 struct IndexTraits<ndarray::index::Range> {
00093 
00094     template <typename D> 
00095     struct Append {
00096         typedef Dimensions< 
00097             D::ND::value, 
00098             ((D::RMC::value < D::N_I::value) ? D::RMC::value : D::N_I::value),
00099             (D::IDX::value + 1)
00100         > Type;
00101     };
00102 
00104     template <typename T, int M, int N> struct TransformCoreResult {
00105         typedef CoreTransformer<T,M-1,N-1> Type;
00106     };
00107 
00109     template <typename T, int M, int N>
00110     static CoreTransformer<T,M-1,N-1> transformCore(
00111         ndarray::index::Range const & index, CoreTransformer<T,M,N> & t
00112     ) {
00113         NDARRAY_ASSERT(index.start <= index.stop);
00114         NDARRAY_ASSERT(index.start >= 0);
00115         NDARRAY_ASSERT(index.stop <= t._input->getSize());
00116         t._data += index.start * t._input->getStride();
00117         t._output->setSize(index.stop - index.start);
00118         t._output->setStride(t._input->getStride());
00119         return t;
00120     }
00121 };

00123 template <>
00124 struct IndexTraits<ndarray::index::Full> {
00125 
00126     template <typename D> 
00127     struct Append {
00128         typedef Dimensions< 
00129             D::ND::value, 
00130             D::RMC::value,
00131             (D::IDX::value + 1)
00132         > Type;
00133     };
00134 
00136     template <typename T, int M, int N> struct TransformCoreResult {
00137         typedef CoreTransformer<T,M-1,N-1> Type;
00138     };
00139 
00141     template <typename T, int M, int N>
00142     static CoreTransformer<T,M-1,N-1> transformCore(
00143         ndarray::index::Full const &, CoreTransformer<T,M,N> & t
00144     ) {
00145         t._output->setSize(t._input->getSize());
00146         t._output->setStride(t._input->getStride());
00147         return t;
00148     }
00149 };

00151 template <>
00152 struct IndexTraits<ndarray::index::Scalar> {
00153 
00154     template <typename D> 
00155     struct Append {
00156         typedef Dimensions< 
00157             (D::ND::value - 1),
00158             ((D::RMC::value < (D::N_I::value - 1)) ? D::RMC::value : (D::N_I::value - 1)),
00159             (D::IDX::value + 1)
00160         > Type;
00161     };
00162 
00164     template <typename T, int M, int N> struct TransformCoreResult {
00165         typedef CoreTransformer<T,M-1,N> Type;
00166     };
00167 
00169     template <typename T, int M, int N>
00170     static CoreTransformer<T,M-1,N> transformCore(
00171         ndarray::index::Scalar const & index, CoreTransformer<T,M,N> & t
00172     ) {
00173         NDARRAY_ASSERT(index.n >= 0);
00174         NDARRAY_ASSERT(index.n < t._input->getSize());
00175         t._data += index.n * t._input->getStride();
00176         return t;
00177     }
00178 };
00179 
00180 template <typename T, int M, int N, typename Index>
00181 typename IndexTraits<Index>::template TransformCoreResult<T,M,N>::Type
00182 transformCore(Index const & index, CoreTransformer<T,M,N> & t) {
00183     return IndexTraits<Index>::transformCore(index, t);
00184 }

00195 template <int N, int C, typename Seq_, bool isColumnMajor = (C < 0)>
00196 struct ViewTraits;

00198 template <int N, int C, typename Seq_>
00199 struct ViewTraits<N,C,Seq_,false> {
00200 
00201     typedef typename boost::mpl::fold< Seq_, Dimensions<N,C,0>, AppendIndex >::type Dims;
00202     
00203     typedef typename Dims::ND ND;
00204     typedef typename Dims::RMC RMC;
00205 
00206 };

00208 template <int N, int C, typename Seq_>
00209 struct ViewTraits<N,C,Seq_,true> {
00210 
00211     typedef typename boost::mpl::fold< 
00212         boost::fusion::reverse_view< typename boost::fusion::result_of::as_vector<Seq_>::type >, 
00213         Dimensions<N,-C,0>, AppendIndex
00214     >::type Dims;
00215     
00216     typedef typename Dims::ND ND;
00217     typedef typename boost::mpl::negate<typename Dims::RMC>::type RMC;
00218 
00219 };

00225 template <int N, typename Seq_, bool IsNormalized=(boost::mpl::template size<Seq_>::type::value==N)>
00226 struct ViewNormalizer {
00227 
00228     typedef typename boost::fusion::result_of::push_back<Seq_ const,index::Full>::type Next;
00229 
00230     typedef typename ViewNormalizer<N,Next>::Output Output;
00231 
00232     static Output apply(Seq_ const & input) {
00233         return ViewNormalizer<N,Next>::apply(
00234             boost::fusion::push_back(input, index::Full())
00235         );
00236     }
00237 };
00238 
00239 template <int N, typename Seq_>
00240 struct ViewNormalizer<N,Seq_,true> {
00241     typedef typename boost::fusion::result_of::as_vector<Seq_>::type Output;
00242     static Output apply(Seq_ const & input) { return boost::fusion::as_vector(input); }
00243 };

00249 template <typename Array_, typename InSeq>
00250 struct ViewBuilder {
00251     typedef ExpressionTraits<Array_> Traits;
00252     typedef typename Traits::Element Element;
00253     typedef typename Traits::ND InputND;
00254     typedef typename Traits::RMC InputRMC;
00255     typedef typename Traits::Core InputCore;
00256     typedef boost::mpl::bool_<(InputRMC::value < 0)> IsColumnMajor;
00257 
00258     typedef ViewNormalizer<InputND::value,InSeq> Normalizer;
00259     typedef typename ViewNormalizer<InputND::value,InSeq>::Output NormSeq;
00260     typedef ViewTraits<InputND::value,InputRMC::value,NormSeq> OutputTraits;
00261 
00262     typedef typename OutputTraits::ND OutputND;
00263     typedef typename OutputTraits::RMC OutputRMC;
00264 
00265     typedef ArrayRef<Element,OutputND::value,OutputRMC::value> OutputArray;
00266     typedef Core<OutputND::value> OutputCore;
00267 
00268     static OutputArray apply(Array_ const & array, InSeq const & seq) {
00269         CoreTransformer<Element,InputND::value,OutputND::value> initial(
00270             array.getData(), 
00271             ArrayAccess< Array_>::getCore(array),
00272             OutputCore::create(array.getManager())
00273         );
00274         NormSeq normSeq = Normalizer::apply(seq);
00275         std::pair<Element*,typename OutputCore::Ptr> final = process(normSeq, initial);
00276         return ArrayAccess< OutputArray >::construct(final.first, final.second);
00277     }
00278 
00279     template <int M, int N>
00280     static std::pair<Element*,typename OutputCore::Ptr>
00281     process(NormSeq const & seq, CoreTransformer<Element,M,N> t) {
00282         return process(seq, transformCore(boost::fusion::at_c<(InputND::value-M)>(seq), t));
00283     }
00284 
00285     static std::pair<Element*,typename OutputCore::Ptr>
00286     process(NormSeq const & seq, CoreTransformer<Element,0,0> t) {
00287         return std::make_pair(t._data, boost::static_pointer_cast<OutputCore>(t._output));
00288     }
00289     
00290 };
00291 
00296 template <typename Array_, typename Seq_>
00297 typename ViewBuilder<Array_, Seq_>::OutputArray
00298 buildView(Array_ const & array, Seq_ const & seq) {
00299     return ViewBuilder<Array_,Seq_>::apply(array, seq);
00300 };
